parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the database instance.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The node ID.

>  This parameter is available only for instances that are deployed in the cluster architecture. You can specify this parameter to query the tasks of a specific node. If this parameter is not specified, the tasks of the primary node are returned by default.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
